title: • Semarak Jawi dan Khat
tags: Yawi Tulisan Kaligrafi Tipografi Calligraphy Typography
content:
Salam Sejahtera Kawanku,  
Cintai Tulisan Jawi kerana ia identiti Bani Jawi/Yawi

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Yawi_6494.jpg)
  
Membandingkan dengan Rumi,  
1. Jawi lebih indah, lebih mudah @ lebih menarik.  
Rumi = 26 +A+B+D+E+G+H+Q+R = 17x2 = 34 bentuk berdiri sendiri.  
Huruf Jawi - titik-2 = Sahaja 19 bentuk yang manis @ tari-menari.  
Tidak seperti Rumi, Jawi suka bercantum.  
Hanya ekor perubahan seperti yang ditunjukkan di [sini](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953/http:/typophile.com/files/QB.pdf)  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jawiware.PNG)
  
2. BM adalah bahasa fonetik, seperti Arab.  
Cara terbaik adalah ditulis dan di [Silangkata](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953/http:/typophile.com/files/Silang%20Kata%20Kelopak_0.pdf) dalam Jawi  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FlowerUmberlla_4398.jpg)
  
Tetapi kebanyakan orang Melayu tidak mengetahui. Rumi diambil, [Jawi tak dihapus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953/http:/beritaharian.sg/gah/sastera/tak-ternilai-khazanah-akhbar-melayu). Masa akan menentukannya:

comments.content: Any chance for an English translation of this post? The attachments are intriguing.

Summarizing:  
Compared to Romanized , Jawi Malay is easier-on-the-eye @ smoother-on-the-hand.

1. Romanized has 52 letterforms (26x2: Capital @ Small).  
Dropping Dots, Jawi has ONLY (19) dynamic forms as elaborated here:  
 [http://typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953/http:/typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf "http://typophile.com/files/QB3.3.pdf")

2. Malay is a phonetic language. It is better written (and crossworded) in Jawi.  
 [http://typophile.com/files/Silang%20Kata%20Kelopak\_0.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415143953/http:/typophile.com/files/Silang%20Kata%20Kelopak_0.pdf "http://typophile.com/files/Silang%20Kata%20Kelopak\_0.pdf")
